data.author: ~ unknown

data.author: Naruto Uzumaki
data.quote: Somebody told me I’m a failure, I’ll prove them wrong.

data.quote: An addict who overcomes addiction is capable of accomplishing anything.

data.author: Chanakya
data.quote: Excessive attachment to sense pleasures leads to bondage, and detachment from sense pleasures leads to liberation. Therefore it is the mind alone that is responsible for bondage or liberation.

data.author: Tyler Durden
data.quote: The things you own, end up owning you.

data.author: Roronoa Zoro (One Piece)
data.quote: You need to accept the fact that you’re not the best and have all the will to strive to be better than anyone you face.

data.author: Diogenes

data.quote: If you don’t like your destiny, don’t accept it.

data.author: ~ unknown
data.quote: If I quit now, I will soon be back to where I started. And when I started, I was desperately wishing to be where I am now.

data.author: Light Yagami
data.quote: You can’t ever win if you’re always on the defensive. To win, you have to attack!

data.author: Marcus Aurelius
data.quote: The more we value things outside our control, the less control we have.

data.author: ~ unknown
data.quote: Use your head instead of what you have between your legs. Self-control is what separates a man from a boy.

data.author: Chanakya
data.quote: As soon as the fear approaches near, attack and destroy it.

data.author: Saitama (One Punch Man)
data.quote: If you really want to be strong… Stop caring about what your surrounding thinks of you!

data.author: Mae West
data.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough

data.author: Marcus Aurelius
data.quote: Have I been made for this, to lie under the blankets and keep myself warm?

data.author: ~ unknown
data.quote: If you ever find yourself in a hole, the first thing you do is stop digging.

data.author: Michael Altshuler
data.quote: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you’re the pilot.

data.author: Erwin Smith (Attack on Titan)
data.quote: If you begin to regret, you’ll dull your future decisions and let others make your choices for you. All that’s left for you then is to die. Nobody can foretell the outcome. Each decision you make holds meaning only by affecting your next decision.

data.author: L (Death Note)
data.quote: Learn to treasure your life because unfortunately, it can be taken away from you anytime.

data.author: Abraham Lincoln
data.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years

data.author: Chanakya
data.quote: There is no austerity equal to a balanced mind, and there is no happiness equal to contentment; there is no disease like covetousness, and no virtue like mercy.

data.author: Queen Latifah
data.quote: Believe in yourself. Stay in your own lane. There’s only one you.

data.author: James Cameron
data.quote: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.

data.author: Naruto Uzumaki
data.quote: It’s not the face that makes someone a monster, it’s the choices they make with their lives.

data.author: Tyler Durden
data.quote: We buy things we don’t need, to impress people we don’t like.

data.author: D.C - Superman
data.quote: There is a superhero in all of us, we just need the courage to put on the cape.

data.author: Confucius
data.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

data.author: L (Death Note)
data.quote: Not every genius is understood.

data.author: Seneca
data.quote: Hang on to your youthful enthusiasms, you will be able to use them better when you are older.

data.author: Musonius Rufus

data.author: Walt Disney

data.author: Lily Tomlin
data.quote: The road to success is always under construction.

data.author: Chanakya
data.quote: Even if a snake is not poisonous, it should pretend to be venomous.

data.author: Diogenes

data.quote: Sometimes, the questions are complicated – and the answers are simple.

data.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people's thinking.

data.author: Tyler Durden
data.quote: Sticking feathers up your butt does not make you a chicken!

data.author: Aldous Huxley
data.quote: Experience is not what happens to you; it is what you do with what happens to you.

data.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.

data.author: Itachi Uchiha (Naruto)

data.author: ~ unknown
data.quote: Do it for the people who want to see you fail.

data.quote: The fragrance of flowers spreads only in the direction of the wind. But the goodness of a person spreads in all directions.

data.quote: May I never be complete, May I never be content, May I never be perfect.

data.author: Will Rogers
data.quote: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.

data.author: Jiraiya (Naruto)
data.quote: A person grows up when he’s able to overcome hardships. Protection is important, but there are some things that a person must learn on his own.

data.quote: Even the strongest of opponents always has a weakness.

data.author: Saitama (One Punch Man)
data.quote: Who decides limits? And based on what? You said you worked hard? Well, maybe you need to work a little harder. Is that really the limit of your strength? Could the you of tomorrow beat you today? Instead of giving in, move forward.

data.author: Marcus Aurelius
data.quote: You have power over your mind – not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.

data.quote: I don't want to die without any scars.

data.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

data.author: Tyler Durden
data.quote: You wanna make an omelet, you gotta break some eggs.

data.quote: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the water to create many ripples.

data.author: Seneca
data.quote: While we are postponing, life speeds by.

data.author: Chanakya
data.quote: We should not feel pride in our charity, austerity, valor, scriptural knowledge, modesty, and morality for the world is full of the rarest gems.

data.author: L (Death Note)
data.quote: Lying monsters are a real nuisance. They are much more cunning than other monsters. They pose as humans even though they have no understanding of the human heart. They eat even though they’ve never experienced hunger. They study even though they have no interest in academics. They seek friendship even though they do not know how to love.

data.author: Herman Melville
data.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.

data.author: Edward Elric (Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood)
data.quote: A lesson without pain is meaningless. That’s because no one can gain without sacrificing something. But by enduring that pain and overcoming it, he shall obtain a powerful, unmatched heart.

data.author: ~ unknown
data.quote: Fall down, get up, fall down, get up, fall down, get up, fall down, get up, fall down, get up, fall down, get up, fall down, get up, stay up, help others.

data.author: Richard Whately
data.quote: Lose an hour in the morning, and you will spend all day looking for it.

data.author: Tyler Durden
data.quote: The lower you fall, the higher you’ll fly.

data.quote: If you are tired of starting over, stop giving up.

data.author: Chanakya
data.quote: A man is great by deeds, not by birth.

data.author: Light Yagami
data.quote: Under normal circumstances, humans should have continued to evolve as the greatest creatures upon this earth, but we were actually regressing. A rotten world. Politics, law, education… Was there anybody around who could correct this world? But someone had to do it.

data.author: Naruto Uzumaki
data.quote: Once you question your own belief, it’s over.

data.quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

data.author: Oscar Wilde
data.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

data.quote: If nobody cares to accept you and wants you in this world, accept yourself and you will see that you don’t need them and their selfish ideas.

data.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams

data.author: Henry Ford
data.quote: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.

data.author: Colin Powell
data.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.

data.author: Marcus Aurelius
data.quote: The only wealth which you will keep forever is the wealth you have given away.

data.author: Monkey D. Luffy (One Piece)
data.quote: If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future!

data.author: Tyler Durden
data.quote: Advertising has us chasing cars and clothes, working jobs we hate so we can buy that we don’t need. We’re the middle children of history, man. No purpose or place. We have no great war. No great depression. Our great war’s a spiritual war, our great depression is our lives.

data.author: Winston Churchill
data.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.

data.quote: People become stronger because they have memories they can’t forget.

data.author: Socrates
data.quote: An unexamined life is not worth living.

data.author: Naruto Uzumaki
data.quote: When people are protecting something truly special to them, they truly can become as strong as they can be.

data.quote: The temptation to quit will be greatest just before you are about to succeed.

data.author: Dr. Seuss
data.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.

data.quote: In a day when you don’t come across any problems, you can be sure that you are travelling on the wrong path.

data.author: Chanakya
data.quote: We should not fret for what is past, nor should we be anxious about the future. Men of discernment deal only with the present moment.

data.author: John Lennon
data.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

data.author: Naruto Uzumaki
data.quote: The many lives lost during long years of conflict… because of those selfless sacrifices, we are able to bathe in peace and prosperity now. To ingrain this history within the new generation will be a vital cog in helping to maintain the peace

data.author: Thomas A. Edison
data.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.

data.author: Rabindranath Tagore
data.quote: The most important lesson that man can learn from life, is not that there is pain in this world, but that it is possible for him to transmute it into joy.

data.author: Guts (Berserk)
data.quote: You’re going to be all right. You just stumbled over a stone in the road. It means nothing. Your goal lies far beyond this. Doesn’t it? I’m sure you’ll overcome this. You’ll walk again… soon.

data.author: Chanakya
data.quote: One whose knowledge is confined to books and whose wealth is in the possession of others, can use neither his knowledge nor wealth when the need for them arises.

data.author: Aristotle
data.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.

data.author: Itachi Uchiha (Naruto)
data.quote: Those who forgive themselves, and are able to accept their true nature… They are the strong ones!

data.author: L (Death Note)

data.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

data.author: Gloria Steinem

data.quote: Sometimes you will never know the value of a moment, until it becomes a memory.

data.author: Lao Tzu
data.quote: Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power.

data.author: Naruto Uzumaki
data.quote: If he rips my arms off, I’ll kick him to death. If he rips my legs off, I’ll bite him to death! If he rips my head off, I’ll stare him to death! And if he gouges out my eyes, I’ll curse him from beyond the grave.

data.author: Norman Vaughan
data.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.

data.quote: Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember — the only taste of success some people get is to take a bite out of you.

data.author: John F. Kennedy
data.quote: Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly.

data.quote: Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.

data.author: Winston Churchill
data.quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.

data.author: Itachi Uchiha (Naruto)
data.quote: Now I feel that maybe knowing who I actually am is the key to reach perfection. Because that means knowing what I can and cannot do.

data.quote: Listen to yourself whining and complaining like some sorry little victim. You can whimper all day long for all I care, you’re nothing but a coward.

data.quote: You’re wrong, that’s not what makes a shinobi. data.author: Mark Twain

data.quote: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness.

data.quote: Haste in every business brings failures.

data.author: Lao Tzu
data.quote: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everybody will respect you.

data.author: Rabindranath Tagore
data.quote: You can’t cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.

data.author: Naruto Uzumaki
data.quote: Don’t underestimate me! I don’t quit and I don’t run.

data.author: Epictetus
data.quote: It is difficulties that show what men are.

data.author: Marcus Aurelius
data.quote: Consider at what price you sell your integrity, but please, for God’s sake, don’t sell it cheap.

data.author: Rabindranath Tagore
data.quote: The one who plants trees, knowing that he will never sit in their shade, has at least started to understand the meaning of life.

data.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
data.quote: I don’t mind what happens. That is the essence of inner freedom. It is a timeless spiritual truth.

data.author: Seneca
data.quote: Cease to hope and you will cease to fear.

data.author: Seneca
data.quote: He who is brave is free.

data.author: Musonius Rufus
data.quote: Only by exhibiting actions in harmony with the sound words which he has received will anyone be helped by philosophy.

data.author: Lao Tzu
data.quote: Great acts are made up of small deeds.

data.author: Marcus Aurelius
data.quote: I cannot escape death, but at least I can escape the fear of it.

data.author: Epictetus
data.quote: If you want something good, get it yourself.

data.author: Rabindranath Tagore
data.quote: The butterfly counts not months but moments and has time enough.

data.author: Swami Vivekananda
data.quote: The greatest religion is to be true to your own nature. Have faith in yourselves.

data.author: Seneca
data.quote: It does not matter how many books you have, but how good are the books which you have.

data.author: Benjamin Franklin
data.quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.

data.author: Epictetus
data.quote: Make the best use of what is in your power, and take the rest as it happens.

data.author: Zeno
data.quote: Steel your sensibilities, so that life shall hurt you as little as possible.

data.author: Musonius Rufus
data.quote: Since every man dies, it is better to die with distinction than to live long.

data.author: Lao Tzu
data.quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.

data.author: Rabindranath Tagore
data.quote: The highest education is that which does not merely give us information but makes our life in harmony with all existence.

data.author: Zeno
data.quote: Better to trip with the feet than with the tongue

data.author: Plato
data.quote: A good decision is based on knowledge and not numbers.

data.author: Epictetus
data.quote: It is the nature of the wise to resist pleasures, but the foolish to be a slave to them.

data.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
data.quote: It is very easy to conform to what your society or your parents and teachers tell you. That is a safe and easy way of existing; but that is not living… to live is to find out for yourself the truth.

data.author: Seneca
data.quote: What really ruins our character is the fact that none of us looks back over his life.

data.author: Seneca
data.quote: Difficulty comes from our lack of confidence.

data.author: Marcus Aurelius
data.quote: Confine yourself to the present.

data.author: Marcus Aurelius
data.quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive – to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.

data.author: Rabindranath Tagore
data.quote: I have become my own vision of an optimist. If I can’t make it through one door, I’ll go through another door – or I’ll make a door. Something terrific will come no matter how dark the present.

data.author: Epictetus
data.quote: Men are disturbed not by things, but by the view which they take of them.

data.author: Lao Tzu
data.quote: People in their handling of affairs often fail when they are about to succeed. If one remains as careful at the end as he was at the beginning, there will be no failure.

data.author: Seneca
data.quote: Only time can heal what reason cannot.

data.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
data.quote: So when you are listening to somebody, completely, attentively, then you are listening not only to the words, but also the feeling of what is being conveyed, to the whole of it, not part of it.

data.author: Marcus Aurelius
data.quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.

data.author: Zeno
data.quote: Extravagance is its own destroyer.

data.author: Swami Vivekananda
data.quote: Experience is the only teacher we have. We may talk and reason all our lives, but we shall never understand a word of truth.

data.author: Seneca
data.quote: Life is long, if you know how to use it.

data.author: Plotinus
data.quote: Knowledge, if it does not determine action, is dead to us.

data.author: Seneca
data.quote: The greatest remedy for anger is delay.

data.author: Seneca
data.quote: Religion is regarded by the common people as true, by the wise as false, and by rulers as useful.

data.author: Swami Vivekananda
data.quote: Take risks in your life. If you win, you may lead; if you lose, you may guide.

data.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
data.quote: Only when your hearts are empty of the things of the mind, is their love. Then you will know what it is to love without separation, without distance, without time, without fear.

data.author: Plato
data.quote: Apply yourself both now and in the next life. Without effort, you cannot be prosperous. Though the land be good, you cannot have an abundant crop without cultivation.

data.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
data.quote: Freedom from the desire for an answer is essential to the understanding of the problem.

data.author: Seneca
data.quote: When a person spends all his time in foreign travel, he ends by having many acquaintances, but no friends.
